mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, user_name,pass_word,mail, create_time, create_user) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{passWord}, #{mail}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userName})

INSERT INTO user_role (user_id, role_code, create_time, is_active) VALUES
(#{role.userId}, #{role.roleCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{role.isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.pass_word, u.mail, u.is_enabled, r.role_code FROM users AS u JOIN user_role AS r ON u.user_id = r.user_id ORDER BY user_id LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
